title: Black Swans: The Impacts We Can't Predict
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Black Swans: The Impacts We Can't Predict.

hook.text: Before 1697, Europeans were certain all swans were white. Then they reached Australia.

buildup.text: Nassim Taleb's Black Swans: rare, unpredictable events with massive consequences that we rationalize after the fact.

discovery.text: 9/11, the internet, COVID-19, the iPhone â€” all Black Swans. None were predicted. All changed the world.

punchline.text: The thing that changes everything is the thing you didn't see coming.

quiz.question: What characterizes a Black Swan event?
options: It's rare, unpredictable, and has massive consequences
